text: The Escapists 2 is a 2017 simulation strategy role playing video game. It is about escaping prisons. The game is a sequel to The Escapists (2015). ==References== Category:2017 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Christmas video games Category:Indie video games Category:IOS games Category:Linux games Category:MacOS games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Puzzle video games Category:Role-playing video games Category:Simulation video games Category:Strategy video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: The Escapists 2
